TypeSignature.Value: public interface IStatement : IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, Java.Sql.IWrapper
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IStatement implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class Java.Sql.IWrapper, class System.IDisposable
type IStatement = interface interface IWrapper interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: The object used for executing a static SQL statement and returning the results it produces.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddBatch(string sql) cil managed

Docs.param: typically this is a SQL INSERT or UPDATE statement
Docs.summary: Adds the given SQL command to the current list of commmands for this Statement object.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs accessing the database or the database does not support batch updates.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Cancel() cil managed

Docs.summary: Cancels this Statement object if both the DBMS and driver support aborting an SQL statement.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs accessing the database.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ClearBatch() cil managed

Docs.summary: Empties this Statement object's current list of SQL commands.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs accessing the database or the database does not support batch updates.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ClearWarnings() cil managed

Docs.summary: Clears all the warnings reported on this Statement object.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs accessing the database.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases this Statement object's database and JDBC resources immediately instead of waiting for this to happen when it is automatically closed.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs accessing the database.

Docs.summary: The constant indicating that all ResultSet objects that have previously been kept open should be closed when calling getMoreResults.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The constant indicating that the current ResultSet object should be closed when calling getMoreResults.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Execute(string sql) cil managed

Docs.summary: Executes the given SQL statement, which may return multiple results.
Docs.returns: true if the first result is a ResultSet object; false if it is an update count or there are no results

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs accessing the database.

abstract member Execute : string * int -> bool

Docs.param: a flag indicating whether to make auto generated keys available for retrieval. This parameter must be one of Statement.NO_GENERATED_KEYS or Statement.RETURN_GENERATED_KEYS.
Docs.summary: Executes the given SQL statement, which may return multiple results.
Docs.returns: true if the first result is a ResultSet object; false if it is an update count or there are no results

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32[] ExecuteBatch() cil managed

Docs.summary: Submits a batch of commands to the database for execution and if all commands execute successfully, returns an array of update counts.
Docs.returns: an array of update counts containing one element for each command in the batch. The elements of the array are ordered according to the order in which commands were added to the batch.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs accessing the database.

Docs.summary: The constant indicating that an error occured while executing a batch statement.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Sql.IResultSet ExecuteQuery(string sql) cil managed

Docs.param: an SQL statement to be sent to the database, typically a static SQL SELECT statement
Docs.summary: Executes the given SQL statement, which returns a single ResultSet object.
Docs.returns: a ResultSet object that contains the data produced by the given query; never null

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs accessing the database or if the statement produces anything other than a single ResultSet.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 ExecuteUpdate(string sql) cil managed

Docs.param: an SQL Data Manipulation Language (DML) statement, such as INSERT, UPDATE or DELETE; or an SQL statement that returns nothing, such as a DDL statement.
Docs.summary: Executes the given SQL statement, which may be an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statement or an SQL statement that returns nothing, such as an SQL DDL statement.
Docs.returns: either (1) the row count for SQL Data Manipulation Language (DML) statements or (2) 0 for SQL statements that return nothing

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs accessing the database or if the statement produces a ResultSet.

a flag that indicates whether to allow retrieval of auto generated keys. Parameter must be one of Statement.RETURN_GENERATED_KEYS or Statement.NO_GENERATED_KEYS

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool GetMoreResults(int32 current) cil managed

Docs.param: a flag indicating what to do with existing ResultSets. This parameter must be one of Statement.CLOSE_ALL_RESULTS, Statement.CLOSE_CURRENT_RESULT or Statement.KEEP_CURRENT_RESULT.
Docs.summary: Moves to this Statement object's next result, returns true if it is a ResultSet object, and implicitly closes any current ResultSet object(s) obtained with the method getResultSet.
Docs.returns: true if the next result is a ResultSet object; false if it is an update count or there are no more results

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs accessing the database.

Docs.summary: The constant indicating that the current ResultSet object should not be closed when calling getMoreResults.
